headline.main: STIMSON MAY GET CALL TO SPY TRIAL; Court Weighs Plea to Let Him Send a Deposition on His Remarks on Bombsight

lead_paragraph: Secretary of War Henry L. Stimson may be summoned to appear as a witness for the defense in the Brooklyn espionage trial, it was indicated yesterday as the case ended its seventh week before Judge Mortimer L. Byers and a jury in United States District Court.
abstract: Lang's counsel seeks permission to obtain Stimson deposition
